class.name: Stack
class.description: Stack class implements the [b]last-in, first-out (LIFO)[/b] policy.

method.name: get_size
method.description: Returns how much value are on the stack. [b]Complexity:[/b] [i]O(1)[/i]

method.name: is_empty
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if there are no values on the stack, and [code]false[/code] if there are values on the stack. [b]Complexity:[/b] [i]O(1)[/i]

method.name: pop
method.description: Removes the value on the top of stack. [b]Complexity:[/b] [i]O(1)[/i]

method.name: push
method.description: Insert a new value on the top of stack. [b]Complexity:[/b] [i]O(1)[/i]

method.name: top
method.description: Returns the value on the top of stack. [b]Complexity:[/b] [i]O(1)[/i]
